TextBody:
Hello Maneesh,

Thank you for your time in today's session.

In the meeting we have successfully fixed the AD issue, by adding the suffix to the settings. 

We have tested with two users and both of them manage to login.

Since the issue is now solved, we will proceed with the closure of this case. 

Have a nice day ahead!

Best regards,
__________________
Daniel Anton | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | MDM | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
www.netwrix.com

Have a nice day ahead!
